subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Rhonda's Folder/Come around and say hi COOL IT WORKS.mp3 
  Uploaded by : rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...> 
  Description : come around and say hi- COOL IT WORKS(I think thats what it says) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda%27s%20Folder/Come%20around%20and%20say%20hi%20COOL%20IT%20WORKS.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...>
